title: Theoretica Chimica Acta
additional-note: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Penn's Franklin record for this serial mentions New York as one of its publication locations, though we do not know if this applies to all issues when originally published.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Timothy Wells for copyright research on this title.
